name: Sleepy Shooter
description:
Turn-base + First Person Shooter

Player and enemy have 100 energy to use before end turn. Walk will comsume energy depend on you walk distance. Shooting will cost much more energy.

WASD to WALK, Left Mouse Button for fire.

Health: 200, Gun Damage per shot:10, Gun Energy Cost:10

Enemy Health:100, Gun Damage per shot:10

Future Plan: Multiplayer as 1 vs 1, assets creation, and more.

Credit:

"Net Bots": Background music from PlayOnLoop.com

Sound Effects: https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/packs/16681/
